title: Sword of Clutching Umbra
content:
Sword of Clutching Umbra Rare 2~7 Damage 1d6 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Fingers of shadow seem to beckon from the dark edge of the blade. Shortsword Light Finesse 0.9 190

Sword of Clutching Umbra

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Fingers of shadow seem to beckon from the dark edge of the blade.

Shortsword Light Finesse

Sword of Clutching Umbra is one of the Shortsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Sword of Clutc
